Input.name: Part File Name
Input.desc: Which file you'd like to print. If your file isn't here, import it from the 'I/O' tab!

General.name: Scan Strategy
General.desc: Which scan strategy you'd like to be used on the part.

General.name: Layer Thickness
General.desc: How thick each layer should be.

Hatching.name: Hatch Default ID
Hatching.desc: The ID of the segment style to use for hatches.

Hatching.name: Contour Default ID
Hatching.desc: The ID of the segment style to use for contours.

Hatching.name: Hatch Angle
Hatching.desc: The hatch angle used on Layer 0. Must be in range [âˆ’180,180].

Hatching.name: Hatch Angle Increment
Hatching.desc: An additional offset used to increment the hatch angle between layers.

Hatching.name: Hatch Distance
Hatching.desc: The distance between adjacent hatch scan vectors.

Hatching.name: Volume Offset Hatch
Hatching.desc: An additional offset may be added (positive or negative) between the contour and the internal hatching.

Hatching.name: Spot Compensation
Hatching.desc: The spot (laser point) compensation factor is the distance to offset the outer-boundary and other internal hatch features in order to factor in the exposure radius of the laser.

Trajectory Ordering.name: Contour First
Trajectory Ordering.desc: Whether to print contours before hatches each layer.

Output.name: Output .HDF5
Output.desc: Whether to print contours before hatches each layer.

Island.name: Island Offset
Island.desc: The island offset is the relative distance (hatch spacing) to move the scan vectors between adjacent checkers.

Island.name: Island Overlap
Island.desc: The length of overlap between adjacent islands in both directions.

Striping.name: Stripe Offset
Striping.desc: The stripe offset is the relative distance (hatch spacing) to move the scan vectors between adjacent stripes.

Striping.name: Stripe Overlap
Striping.desc: The length of overlap between adjacent stripes.
